title: "Social Factors in Machine Learning Models Aid CVD Prediction"
excerpt: "Machine learning approaches are useful for cardiovascular disease prediction, and model performance is improved with inclusion of social determinants of health, according to a review published online July 27 in the American Journal of Preventive Medicine ."
